pageProps.title: How does one work with a designer?
pageProps.content:
A lot of software requires a GUI (Graphical User Interface), and we as software engineers will sometimes have to work with a totally adjacent role. We talk about what the process is like at a high level. Everything from brainstorming to product launch. You may think you implemented that design correctly on the first try and I can almost guarantee you, you are wrong. Next we talk about ðŸ˜± THE EDGE ðŸ˜±. Ooo scary term.
